amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the need for a United States animal identification program as an effective disease surveillance, monitoring, and control tool serving the needs of the United States livestock industry and public health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2841 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2841 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Hagel. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2668; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2668) To express the sense of the Senate on the need for a United States animal identification program as an effective disease surveillance, monitoring, and control tool serving the needs of the United States livestock industry and public health.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2841 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2841 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Hagel.
